source.6bffadb4:
For 1000+ teams the medal thresholds are(https://www.kaggle.com/progression):
Bronze - top 10%
Silver - top 5%
Gold - top 10 + 0.2%(13 teams currently)
source.b016cf34: gold medal zone(assuming constant number of teams 1500+)
source.2870f6f5: How the top1 score changed over time
source.b55d0d46: In this toy kernel I show how the score threshold for top1, gold, silver and bronze medals changes as days pass. The kernel is made 1 day before the competition ends. You can try extrapolating this to the last day to forecast your expected public LB rank.
